Years later, the legendary Mortal Kombat series of returns such that some remember it and wait for thousands of players. It is a cruel, bloody and merciless battle for life and death battle in which only the strongest can win.
Centennial needed Shao Kahn, to defeat the Reydenom and its allies. However, in the face of death, Raiden still been able to use their last chance to save the world. He sent a mental message to yourself in the past, during the first tournament, when the forces of good were still able to destroy Shao Kahn ...
Players will take part in the tournament, "Mortal Kombat", learn the true history of the world's Mortal Kombat and change the past to save the future.
 

Repack features:
======================
It is based on pirates
Do not cut | Do not recoded
Game files are not touched
DLC:
- Characters Scarlet, Kenshi, Rain and Freddy Krueger;
- 15 classic suits;
- 3 classic fatalities for Scorpion, Sub-Zero and Reptile.
Version of the game - v.1.0
Installation time - 10 minutes
RePack by SEYTER
